title: Publish CallCraftAI to the free Caffeine domain
constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep the backend as a single Motoko actor; do not introduce additional backend services.
nonGoals: Buying or configuring a custom domain (the request is to publish to the free Caffeine subdomain).
Adding new product features or changing marketing-site content unrelated to publishing.
